ability.Intimidate: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of opponents by 1 stage.
ability.Red-Moon Defense: If this Pokemon receives damage from attack, the attacker loses 1/16 of its max HP. If the attcker is burned, further loses 1/16.

Red Dragon.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Brave Bird.effect: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target.

Dragon Dance.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.

Iron Head.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Roost.effect: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP.
